titleStmt.title: The lavvs discovery: or a brief detection of sundry notorious errors and abuses contained in our English laws, whereby thousands are annually stript of their estates, and some of their lives. By a well-wisher to his countrey.
titleStmt.author: Well-wisher to his countrey.
J. F.
